duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform maintenance and repair of in-store equipment such as HVAC, refrigeration, beverage equipment, fuel dispensers, plumbing, and electrical systems.
Respond to work orders related to general maintenance issues and execute repairs efficiently and effectively.
Replace 'plug and play' equipment as necessary and manage an independent work schedule.
Interact with store staff and customers to address maintenance issues and provide support as needed.
Ensure compliance with safety and maintenance standards while managing work orders and repair processes.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED, with a minimum of 1 year experience in mechanical, facilities, or construction trade, or trade school equivalent.
Valid driver’s license and good driving record for driving company vehicle.
Certifications for electrical and/or plumbing preferred. Other certifications or licenses such as OSHA, HAZMAT, mechanical, etc., are a plus.
